title: Mike Tyson!!
review: I get that these are youtubers and probably why they got this movie and that its boy humor, and people will hate on this as I wanted to. But I was curious to watch because of Tyson and honestly once i got past all of that I laughed through the whole thing......maybe it was the weed. I was surprised Tyson could act too! I thought it was well done and high quality for a little youtube movie

title: I love it
review: I watched this movie as soon as it came it out and I think the boys did incredible! I expected it to be goofy and it was exactly that. I'm so incredibly proud of these boys! (If you haven't seen it go watch it now!) My insta is Grayceisbeauty

title: Amazing!!!
review: I loved this movie so much! i've been supporting these boys for years and i'm so proud of them for this. they deserve more recognition!! insta= gabb_2799
